question: Will there be Pennie cobranding opportunities?
text:
Will there be Pennie cobranding opportunities?
          
        
To learn how to co-brand with Pennie please reach out to the Pennie marketing team. Just as partners are important to Pennies success, partners are also important to helping Pennie maintain brand standards. Our partners should adhere to Pennies Brand Guide. If you plan to use Pennies logo, please reach out to us to make sure that you are in compliance. Our Marketing & Communications team are here to help you support Pennie.
